description: Airport management database (Flughafen DB) containing information about airports, airlines, flights, bookings, passengers, employees, and weather data
license: CC BY 4.0 by Stefan Pr√∂ll, Eva Zangerle, Wolfgang Gassler
version: Updated with bug fixes and date adjustments (flights moved forward 10 years + 4 months)

tables.name: airport
tables.description: Master table of airports with IATA/ICAO codes
tables.key_relationships: Referenced by airline, flight, flightschedule, airport_geo

tables.name: airport_geo
tables.description: Geographic coordinates and location data for airports

tables.name: airport_reachable
tables.description: Temporary in-memory table for airport connectivity calculations

tables.name: airline
tables.key_relationships: References airport; referenced by flight, flightschedule, airplane

tables.name: airplane_type
tables.description: Catalog of airplane models and specifications

tables.name: airplane
tables.description: Individual airplanes with capacity and ownership
tables.key_relationships: References airplane_type and airline; referenced by flight

tables.name: flight
tables.key_relationships: References airport (from/to), airline, airplane; referenced by booking, flight_log

tables.name: flightschedule
tables.description: Recurring flight schedules with days of operation

tables.name: passenger
tables.description: Basic passenger information with passport numbers

tables.name: passengerdetails
tables.description: Extended passenger contact and demographic information

tables.name: booking
tables.description: Flight bookings with seat assignments and pricing

tables.name: weatherdata
tables.description: Historical weather observations at airport stations

core_relationships.description: flight <- booking.flight_id, references airline, airplane, airport

data_quality_notes: Gender values standardized to 'm' and 'f' (was 'w' for female in German)
Flight dates updated to be current (10 years + 4 months forward)
Base airport fixes applied for some airlines
